thread.title: Selena Gomez hits 110 million Instagram followers | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez hits 110 million Instagram followers | Daily Mail Online

author: Heidi Parker For Dailymail.Com
title: Selena Gomez hits 110 million Instagram followers | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Selena Gomez is 'very grateful' after hitting 110 million Instagram followers. The Heart Wants What It Wants hitmaker is thrilled to have reached the impressive amount of followers on the photo sharing site and says she will 'continue to cherish her platform and speaking [the] truth.' Captioning a photograph of herself standing on stage in front of thousands of fans, she wrote: 'Thank you fam for 110. I promise I will continue to cherish my platform and speaking truth but more importantly, each and every one of you have changed my life. I'm very grateful.' Tops: Selena Gomez is 'very grateful' after hitting 110 million Instagram followers. Pictured Thursday in an Instagram video Her thank you note: Captioning a photograph of herself standing on stage in front of thousands of fans, she wrote: 'Thank you fam for 110. I promise I will continue to cherish my platform and speaking truth but more importantly' And Selena has another reason to celebrate as her romance with The Weeknd is going from strength to strength. The 24-year-old singer recently shelled out a hefty $30,000 on a birthday party for the Can't Feel My Face singer. The party was held at Dave & Buster's in Hollywood, which was attended by the singer's friends including French Montana, Big Sean and 2 Chainz. Whilst Selena wasn't able to make it to the party, she was seen with him on a romantic yacht trip. Stay true: The Heart Wants What It Wants hitmaker is thrilled to have reached the impressive amount of followers on the photo sharing site and says she will 'continue to cherish her platform and speaking [the] truth.'
